purpose: Results from this project could also inform other current and future efforts to provide support to community and college students.
question: Are there practices that could improve operations, efficiency, or utilization of Finish Line Grants?
deliverable:
- Evaluation report
- [Recommended practices for local partnerships administering Finish Line Grants](https://www.nccommerce.com/documents/recommended-practices-local-partnerships-administering-finish-line-grants)
summary: The Finish Line Grants program is designed to help community college students complete their education and training when facing unforeseen challenges. Grants are available to eligible community college students in amounts of up to $1,000 per semester. This project aims to help identify, share, and facilitate process improvements to the Finish Line Grants program.
agency: QN Department of Commerce and Quinetucket Community College System Office
title: Finish Line Grants
